summary:
Get full control of the game on your controller.
Added 15 hotkeys to the Xbox360 controller.
descriptionHtml:
Russian description see the Readme.txt

Description:
If you play on your controller and you\'re not comfortable reach for the keyboard - this mod is for you.
Get full control of the game on your controller.
Added 15 hotkeys to the Xbox360 controller. Update 4 buttons in the settings of the controller.

Installation:
If you changed the settings keys make a copy of file \"ControlMap_Custom.txt\". Extract the contents of the archive to your Skyrim folder.

Deinstallation:
Remove files \"ControlMap_Custom.txt\" and \"Data\\Interface\\controls\\pc\\controlmap.txt\".

Configuration controller:
A        = activate
X        = ready weapon
Y        = shout
B        = jump
Back     = tween menu
Start    = journal
LS       = move
RS       = look
LS click = sneak
RS click = toggle POV
LT       = left hand
RT       = right hand
LB       = sprint
RB       = empty

LB+X       = magic
LB+Y       = stats
LB+B       = inventory
LB+A       = map
A+B        = wait
A+Back     = quick save
A+Start    = quick load
A+LS click = auto-move
RB+A       = zoom in (3rd person view)
RB+B       = zoom out (3rd person view)

up(digital)       = favorites
down(digital)     = favorites
left(digital)     = Hotkey 1
right(digital)    = Hotkey 2
LB+left(digital)  = Hotkey 3
LB+right(digital) = Hotkey 4
RB+left(digital)  = Hotkey 5
RB+right(digital) = Hotkey 6
LB+Back           = Hotkey 7
RB+Start          = Hotkey 8

up&down(digital) = scrolling favorites
up&down LS       = scrolling favorites


Thanks for the idea: redninjas & PS2MAN

Sorry for my english.

Version 1.1: update layout
author: IronDemon
